Module FoundationsF25_2
Package guiMultipleRoleDispatch

Class ViewMultipleRoleDispatch

java.lang.Object
guiMultipleRoleDispatch.ViewMultipleRoleDispatch
public class ViewMultipleRoleDispatch extends Object

Title: ViewMultipleRoleDispatch Class

Description: Java/FX-based page for users with multiple roles. Provides interface to select and perform a specific role (Admin, Staff, or Student). Includes logout and quit functionality.

Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter Â© 2025

Version:
1.00 2025-08-20 Initial version
Author:
Lynn Robert Carter

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewMultipleRoleDispatch

      private ViewMultipleRoleDispatch()

      Constructor: ViewMultipleRoleDispatch()

      Description: Initializes all GUI widgets, including labels, combo box, buttons, and separators. Populates role options based on current user.

  • Method Details

    • displayMultipleRoleDispatch

      public static void displayMultipleRoleDispatch(javafx.stage.Stage ps, User user)

      Method: displayMultipleRoleDispatch(Stage ps, User user)

      Description: Entry point to show the Multiple Role Dispatch page. Initializes GUI if needed, populates role options, and shows the stage.

      Parameters:
      ps - The JavaFX Stage for this GUI
      user - The current logged-in User

    • setupLabelUI

      private void setupLabelUI(javafx.scene.control.Label l, String ff, double f, double w, javafx.geometry.Pos p, double x, double y)

      Helper method to setup a Label

      Parameters:
      l - The Label to configure
      ff - The font family for the label
      f - The font size for the label
      w - The minimum width of the label
      p - The alignment for the label content
      x - The X coordinate for the label layout
      y - The Y coordinate for the label layout
